title: Ensure SSH version 2 is enabled
description: SSH version 1 has known cryptographic weaknesses. Only SSHv2 must be used.
remediation_text: Enable SSH version 2 to prevent cryptographic attacks inherent in SSHv1.

title: Ensure password encryption service is enabled
description: The service password-encryption command encrypts plaintext passwords in the config.
remediation_text: Enable password encryption to protect credentials stored in configuration.

title: Ensure enable secret is configured
description: The enable secret command uses MD5 hashing and must be used instead of enable password.
remediation_text: Configure an enable secret with a strong password.

title: Ensure HTTP server is disabled
description: The HTTP server provides an insecure web management interface and should be disabled.
remediation_text: Disable the HTTP server to prevent unencrypted management access.

title: Ensure HTTPS server uses TLS 1.2 or higher
description: If HTTPS is enabled, it must use TLS 1.2 or newer for secure management.
remediation_text: Enable the HTTPS secure server for encrypted management access.

title: Ensure logging is enabled
description: Logging must be enabled to record security events for audit and forensic purposes.
remediation_text: Enable buffered logging at an appropriate level.

title: Ensure timestamps are enabled for logging
description: Timestamps provide essential correlation data for security event investigation.
remediation_text: Enable logging timestamps for event correlation.
remediation_command: service timestamps log datetime msec localtime show-timezone

title: Ensure NTP server is configured
description: NTP ensures accurate time synchronization crucial for log correlation.
remediation_text: Configure NTP server for accurate time synchronization.

title: Ensure SNMP community strings are not default
description: Default SNMP community strings (public/private) must be changed or SNMP disabled.
remediation_text: Remove default SNMP community strings and use SNMPv3 with authentication.
remediation_command:
no snmp-server community public
no snmp-server community private
snmp-server group v3group v3 auth

title: Ensure login banner is configured
description: A login banner warns unauthorized users and may be legally required.
remediation_text: Configure a login banner with appropriate unauthorized access warning.
remediation_command: banner motd # Authorized Access Only. All activity is monitored. #
